page.title: 19IS IT BREAK YET, MR PRICE?
page.content: WE LIKE TO PLAY AND TO HAVE SOME FRESH AIR AT BREAK TIMES. RICHARD IS THE GREEN SLIME MONSTER WITH JONATHAN; EMILY IS FIRESTAR AND PAUL IS THE HULK. WE CATCH THE BADDIES AND PUT THEM IN THE HOLE MADE BY THE HULK WHO SMASHES HIS HANDS ON THE GROUND. WE PLAY AT THE GOLDEN EAGLE. EMILY CHASES JONATHAN WHO IS MONKEY MAGIC, PAUL WHO IS HE-MAN AND RICHARD WHO IS SPIDERMAN. HE-MAN SAVES HIS FRIENDS BY SMASHING A WALL DOWN AND SAVING THEM. IN A GAME CALLED MANIMAL PAUL TURNS INTO A LEOPARD, EMILY TURNS INTO A LION AND EVERYONE BECOMES AN ANIMAL. WHEN THE BADDIES SET THE HOUSE ON FIRE THE LEOPARD JUMPS OUT OF THE WINDOW AND SAVES THE LADY. WE GET THE IDEAS FOR OUR GAMES FROM THE TELEVISION. IF WE DON'T WISH TO GO OUTSIDE AT BREAK TIMES WE CAN STAY IN SCHOOL OR SPEND THE TIME PARTLY IN AND OUT. SMASHING!
